channel.title: Help with Highscore (Highscore maker)
channel.description:
I did all step in this topic and I get no errors: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,364364.0.html
But when I go to my site http://localhost/highscores , I see nothing, there's no Image and no players ranked:
[IMG]http://i380.photobucket.com/albums/oo245/zamorak_album_2008/highscore.jpg[/img]
Can anyone help me to solve this problem please ?
Thanks.

item.title: Help with Highscore (Highscore maker)
item.dc:creator: @Envion Envion
item.description:
@Envion wrote:

slimjimm000:

wow no one on moparscape helps me because i’m an inarticulate preteen brb crying

Database is devoid of any rows of player data. Everything is working fine.

Also, change the image hyperlinking. Make it relative to the location of the index file. I didn’t check, but based on the quality of the code I saw in that application, it probably isn’t.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with Highscore (Highscore maker)

item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

[quote=“ChaosPkers, post:3, topic:293414”][quote author=raped by who link=topic=388267.msg2902630#msg2902630 date=1249611165]
There’s a tutorial on how to add highscores.

If you cant follow a tutorial, you probably cant follow the help needed either.

/sent to mod
[/quote]If you read the text in his post, you would know he claimed to have done the steps, and has gotten it to work, but needs help with one error…[/quote]

You are totaly right, ChaosPkers. I NEED HELP.

Read full topic
